description:
After http://anidb.net/ch81990 [Utsuro] was defeated, the surviving http://anidb.net/ch6221 [Shinsengumi] members ignored http://anidb.net/ch1658 [Yamazaki]`s corpse and cheered on their victory. His body was later recovered and rebuilt (with his memories erased as well) into a cyborg named Mobcop.
Source: Gintama Wiki
name: MobCop
